item.title: Shooting at a historically Black university's homecoming fest in Pennsylvania kills 1 and wounds 6
item.description: Authorities say gunfire erupted during outdoor festivities at Pennsylvania’s Lincoln University, killing one person and wounding six others

item.title: Biden calls these 'dark days' as he urges Americans to 'get back up'
item.description: Former President Joe Biden is calling these “dark days.”
